attributes.action: Stop the closing of wythenshawe indoor market
attributes.additional_details: This market has been a part of this community for as long as I can remember, it's closure would be like ripping the heart of the community out, please reconcider this proposal
attributes.background: Reverse the decision to close the indoor market at wythenshawe town centre

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
